result.title: what means "Path"? (advanced version)
result.content:
hi! which is definition of "Path" in English?

1: a path without passing same edge twice or more
2: a path with arbitrary edge and we can pass an edge 2 or more times
or less formally is there any difference between PATH and SHORTEST PATH
today I read a tutorial which "path" means a path that able to pass a edge twice or more but in Persian it means without passing an edge twice, can anyone please tell it's known in English?
Yes or No is very enough for me:)))) thx
UPD: Usually blogs which ask potty problems get negative votes; But I didn't expect too much like this, my contribution lowered 7 by 2 minutes. Thank you guys :))))))))))
